00003 def createPosList(k, random):
00004 
00005     pzero = [ [0]*len(k[i]) for i in xrange(len(k)) ]
00006 
00007     a = random.randint(0, len(k)-1)
00008     b = random.randint(0, len(k[a])-1)
00009 
00010     flag = 0
00011     
00012     pzero[a][b] = 1
00013     while (flag == 0):
00014         for i in xrange(sum(pzero[a])):
00015             if k[a][b+i][1] == 1.0 or k[a][b+i][1] == 0.0:
00016                 pass
00017             else:
00018                 ctr = 0
00019                 for j in xrange(b+i):
00020                     if k[a][j][1] == 1.0 or k[a][j][1] == 0.0:
00021                         pass
00022                     else:
00023                         ctr = ctr + 1
00024                 pzero[a+1][2*ctr] = 1
00025                 pzero[a+1][2*ctr+1] = 1
00026                 #print pzero
00027                 
00028         a = a+1
00029         if a == len(k):
00030             flag = 1
00031             break
00032         elif sum(pzero[a]) == 0:
00033             flag = 1
00034             break
00035         else:  
00036             b = pzero[a].index(1)
00037 
00038     return pzero

00040 def extractTree(k, pos):
00041 
00042     extractedTree = []
00043     for i in xrange(len(pos)):
00044         level = []
00045         for j in xrange(len(pos[i])):
00046             if pos[i][j] == 1:
00047                 level.append(k[i][j])
00048         if level != []:
00049             extractedTree.append(level)
00050 
00051     return extractedTree
00052

00054 def cross(child,pos,extTree):
00055 
00056     flag = 0
00057     # 1) In pos go to the first "1" position, delete the corresponding entry in child and replace by first entity in extTree
00058     for i in xrange(len(pos)):
00059         if sum(pos[i]) != 0:
00060             j = pos[i].index(1)
00061             break
00062 
00063     del child[i][j]
00064     child[i].insert(j,extTree[0][0])
00065 
00066     # 2) In pos, after the first "1" position, find all other "1" positions and delete corresponding entries in child
00067     for k in xrange(i+1,len(pos)):
00068         count = 0
00069         for l in xrange(len(pos[k])):
00070             if pos[k][l] == 1:
00071                 count = count+1
00072                 if count == 1:
00073                     del child[k][l]
00074                 else:
00075                     del child[k][l-count+1]
00076 
00077     k = 1
00078     
00079     # 3) starting inserting extTree into child
00080     while (flag == 0):
00081         # does extTree[k] exist?
00082         if len(extTree) > k:                     # does exist
00083             # does child[i+1] exist?
00084             if len(child) <= i+1:                # does not exist
00085                 # create child[i+1] by appending [] to child
00086                 child.append([])
00087 
00088             # in child[i] find number of positions before j where child[i][][1] > 0.0 and < 1.0
00089             ctr = 0
00090             for l in xrange(j):
00091                 if child[i][l][1] == 1.0 or child[i][l][1] == 0.0:
00092                     pass
00093                 else:
00094                     ctr = ctr + 1
00095 
00096             for l in xrange(len(extTree[k])):
00097                 child[i+1].insert(2*ctr+l,extTree[k][l])
00098 
00099             j = 2*ctr
00100             i = i+1
00101             k = k+1
00102         else:
00103             flag = 1
00104 
00105     # 4) clean up child - delete any empty lists that may exist in child
00106     emptyCheck = 0
00107     i = 0
00108     length = len(child)
00109     while (emptyCheck < length):
00110         if child[i] == []:
00111             del child[i]
00112         else:
00113             i = i+1
00114         emptyCheck = emptyCheck + 1
00115 
00116     return child
00117 
00118 def countLeaves(genome):
00119     count = 0
00120     for node in genome:
00121         if type(node[0]) is list:
00122             count += countLeaves(node)
00123         else:
00124             if node[1] == 1.0 or node[1] == 0.0:
00125                 count += 1
00126     return count

00129 def setInherit(c1, c2, c1_from_p1, c2_from_p1, p1Len, p2Len):
00130     c1.from_p1 = c1_from_p1/float(p1Len)
00131     c1.from_p2 = 1. - c1.from_p1
00132 
00133     c2.from_p1 = c2_from_p1/float(p2Len)
00134     c2.from_p2 = 1. - c2.from_p1
00135

00137 def tree(p1, p2, prob, points, random):
00138 
00139     if random.random() < prob:
00140         
00141         c1Genome = copy.deepcopy(p1.genome[1:])
00142         c2Genome = copy.deepcopy(p2.genome[1:])
00143 
00144         pos1 = createPosList(c1Genome, random)
00145         pos2 = createPosList(c2Genome, random)
00146     
00147         # extract subtrees
00148         extTree1 = extractTree(c1Genome,pos1)
00149         extTree2 = extractTree(c2Genome,pos2)
00150 
00151         ext1Leaves = countLeaves(extTree1)
00152         ext2Leaves = countLeaves(extTree2)
00153         p1Leaves = countLeaves(c1Genome)
00154         p2Leaves = countLeaves(c2Genome)
00155         from_p1 = p1Leaves - ext1Leaves
00156         from_p2 = p2Leaves - ext2Leaves
00157 
00158         k1 = cross(c1Genome,pos1,extTree2)
00159         k2 = cross(c2Genome,pos2,extTree1)
00160         k1Leaves = countLeaves(k1)
00161         k2Leaves = countLeaves(k2)
00162 
00163 
00164         if not(k1Leaves == from_p1+ext2Leaves and k2Leaves == from_p2+ext1Leaves):
00165             print 'Error!!'
00166 
00167         k1.insert(0,p1.genome[0])
00168         k2.insert(0,p2.genome[0])
00169 
00170         c1 = copy.deepcopy(p1)
00171         c2 = copy.deepcopy(p2)
00172         c1.genome = k1
00173         c2.genome = k2
00174 
00175         c1.from_p1 = from_p1/float(k1Leaves)
00176         c1.from_p2 = 1. - c1.from_p1
00177 
00178         c2.from_p2 = from_p2/float(k2Leaves)
00179         c2.from_p1 = 1. - c2.from_p2
00180 
00181         #setInherit(c1, c2, from_p1, k2Leaves-from_p2, k1Leaves, k2Leaves)
00182 
00183     else:
00184         c1 = copy.deepcopy(p1)
00185         c2 = copy.deepcopy(p2)
00186 
00187     return (c1, c2)
